languages.text: "Прости меня, Альбрис. Ты спас меня от Кошмаров, но я никогда не был достоин твоей доброты".

traits.locale_text: "Прости меня, Альбрис. Я никогда не был достоен твоей доброты".

languages.text: "Forgive me, Albris. You saved me from the Nightmares, but I never was worthy of your kindness."
languages.original_text: "Прости меня, Альбрис. Ты спас меня от Кошмаров, но я никогда не был достоин твоей доброты".

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, Albris. You saved me from the Nightmares, but I never was worthy of your kindness."
"Forgive me, Albris. You saved me from the Nightmares, but I never was worthy of your kindness."
"Forgive me, Albris. You saved me from the Nightmares, but I never was worthy of your kindness."
"Forgive me, Albris. You saved me from the Nightmares, but I never was worthy of your kindness."
"Forgive me, Albris. You saved me from the Nightmares, but I never was worthy of your kindness."

languages.text: 「許してくれ、アルブリス。君は私を悪夢から救ってくれたが、私は君の優しさにふさわしくなかった」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Albris. You saved me from the Nightmares, but I never was worthy of your kindness."

traits.locale_text: 「許してくれ、アルブリス。君は私を悪夢から救ってくれたが、私は君の優しさにふさわしくなかった」

languages.text: « Pardon, Albris... Tu m'as sauvé des cauchemars, mais je n'ai jamais été digne de ta générosité. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Albris. You saved me from the Nightmares, but I never was worthy of your kindness."

traits.locale_text: « Pardon, Albris... » Tu m'as sauvé des cauchemars, mais je n'ai jamais été digne de ta générosité. »

languages.text: “原谅我，阿布里斯。是你从梦魇手中救了我一命，但我根本配不上像你这么善良的人。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Albris. You saved me from the Nightmares, but I never was worthy of your kindness."

traits.locale_text: “原谅我，阿布里斯。是你从梦魇手中救了我一命，但我根本配不上像你这么善良的人。”

languages.text: «Perdóname, Albris. Me salvaste de las pesadillas, aunque no me mereciera tal compasión».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Albris. You saved me from the Nightmares, but I never was worthy of your kindness."

traits.locale_text: «Perdóname, Albris. Me salvaste de las pesadillas, aunque no me mereciera tal compasión».

languages.text: "Vergebt mir, Albris. Ihr habt mich vor den Albträumen gerettet, doch ich war Eurer Güte nie würdig."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Albris. You saved me from the Nightmares, but I never was worthy of your kindness."

traits.locale_text: "Vergebt mir, Albris. Ihr habt mich vor den Albträumen gerettet, doch ich war Eurer Güte nie würdig."

languages.text: "Affet beni Albris. Sen beni Kâbuslardan kurtardın ama ben bu kibarlığına layık biri olamadım."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, Albris. You saved me from the Nightmares, but I never was worthy of your kindness."

traits.locale_text: "Affet beni Albris. Sen beni Kâbuslardan kurtardın ama ben bu kibarlığına layık biri olamadım."
